components.light

Class DefaultLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Component
      • components.light.DefaultLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Invalidatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectionalLightComponent, PointLightComponent, SpotLightComponent

    public abstract class DefaultLightComponent
extends Component
    This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
    See Also:
    GameObject, DirectionalLight, PointLight, SpotLight

      • setDiffuseColor

        public void setDiffuseColor(@NotNull
                            org.joml.Vector3f diffuse)
        Sets the diffuse color to the given value. All of diffuse color's components must be min. 0.
        Parameters:
        diffuse - diffuse color
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - color can't be lower than 0

      • createUbo

      • releaseUbo

        public static void releaseUbo()
        Releases the UBO. After calling this mathod, you can't use the LightSources UBO and can't recreate it. Note that some renderers (like the BlinnPhongRenderer) may expect to access to the LightSources UBO (which isn't possible after calling this method).
